radiographic_examinations.findings: No significant drop of signal on the T1 out-of-phase images compared to the in-phase images; liver has a homogeneous signal without focal mass lesion; no intra or extrahepatic biliary ductal dilation; common duct measures up to 8 mm; no retained stones within the common duct or cystic duct remnant; a 7 mm cystic focus adjacent to the pancreatic tail; smaller punctate cysts along the body and uncinate of the pancreas; moderate-sized axial hiatal hernia; dominant left-sided renal cyst measuring 3.7 cm; several sub cm renal cysts in bilateral kidneys; trace pleural fluid; no significant abdominal free fluid.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Common duct measures up to 8 mm in diameter, similar to prior CT.
